name: Used Nike Precision IV
description: Played just once season with these. Getting a new pair for the next season. Great pair of basketball shoes. Size 13, scored a high of 42 with these. Had one of my best seasons with these. Trying to share the wealth.

name: Used Stephan Curry 7 Size 10
description: They sent me an extra pair of shoes for some reason, so I'm selling them. They're brand new, never been worn. Size 10. They're a great pair of shoes, I have a pair myself. They're very comfortable and have great traction. They're also very stylish. I would recommend them to anyone.
